Ventilator-dependent respiratory failure.context: Ventilator-dependent respiratory failure and multiple strokes.

multiple strokes.context: Ventilator-dependent respiratory failure and multiple strokes.

50-year-old.context: The patient is a 50-year-old gentleman who presented to the Emergency Department who had had multiple massive strokes.

multiple massive strokes.context: The patient is a 50-year-old gentleman who presented to the Emergency Department who had had multiple massive strokes.

ventilator assistance.context: He had required ventilator assistance and was transported to the ICU setting.

prolonged ventilatory course.context: Because of the numerous deficits from the stroke, he is expected to have a prolonged ventilatory course and he will be requiring long-term care.

long-term care.context: Because of the numerous deficits from the stroke, he is expected to have a prolonged ventilatory course and he will be requiring long-term care.

general anesthesia.context: The patient was brought to the Operative Suite where he was placed in supine position and general anesthesia was delivered through the existing endotracheal tube.

chest x-ray.context: The patient was returned to the ICU setting in stable condition where a chest x-ray is pending.
